Public Class FlowDocument Inherits FrameworkContentElement Implements IAddChild, IDocumentPaginatorSource, IServiceProvider
public ref class FlowDocument : System::Windows::FrameworkContentElement, IServiceProvider, System::Windows::Documents::IDocumentPaginatorSource, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild

summary.span: 用高级文档功能（如分页和列）承载流内容和设置流内容格式。

span.span: Hosts and formats flow content with advanced document features, such as pagination and columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强制实施子内容的强内容模型。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 中包含的顶级子元素必须派生自。Top-level child elements contained in a must be derived from . 有效的顶级子元素包括：Valid top-level child elements include the following: - - - - - 默认值为包含用于显示文档，如果你使用作为 XAML 文件中的根元素。The default for contains a that is used to display the document if you use as the root element in a XAML file. 如果不是根元素中，可以在显示的文档、 ，或控件。If is not the root element, the document can be displayed in a , a , or a control. 你还可以编辑中控件。You can also edit a in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效输入类型`block`包括， ， ， ，和。Valid input types for `block` include , , , , and . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following example demonstrates the use of this constructor. 在这种情况下，包含数据流元素块结构包含的文本运行嵌套段落中。In this case, the contains a flow element block structure consisting of a text run nested in a paragraph. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentConstructorSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentconstructorsimple)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentConstructorSimple](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentconstructorsimple)] 下面的示例以编程方式构造一个简单的 2 x 2 表，然后使用构造函数来创建一个新包含表。The following example programmatically constructs a simple 2 x 2 table and then uses the constructor to create a new containing the table. 尽管使用某种程度上更复杂的流元素块结构时，使用的构造函数是与前面的示例中的相同。Though a somewhat more complicated flow element block structure is used, use of the constructor is the same as in the preceding example. MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ColumnGap { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置列间隔值，该值指示 中各列之间的间距。

span.span: Gets or sets the column gap value, which indicates the spacing between columns in a .

value.span: 列间隔，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The column gap, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 值为(等效于特性值的"自动") 指示列间隔是否等于属性。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") indicates that the column gap is equal to the property.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前列间隔。Getting this property returns the current column gap. 设置此值更改当前有效列间隔，并可能导致内容进行重排。Setting this value changes the currently effective column gap, and may cause content to reflow. 列间隔不能超过当前减去所有。The column gap cannot exceed the current minus any . 如果值属性超过此限制，有效列间隔减少为观察此限制。If the value of the property exceeds this limit, the effective column gap is reduced to observe this limit. 此属性如果不起作用是`null`。This property has no effect if is `null`. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置用于绘制列之间标尺的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the used to draw the rule between columns.

value.span: （用于绘制列之间的标尺线），或 （不使用背景画笔）。

span.span: A to use when drawing the rule line between columns, or to not use a background brush.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列规则是内容的列之间绘制和用于直观地分隔开的列的行。The column rule is a line that is drawn between columns, and is used to visually separate columns of content. 显示可用的预定义的画笔颜色样本的表，请参阅。For a table of swatches that show the available predefined brush colors, see . 此属性如果不起作用属性为 0 或`null`。This property has no effect if the property is 0 or `null`. 仅当有两个或多个列时，才显示列规则。Column rules are displayed only when there are two or more columns. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentcolumnrule)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentcolumnrule)]

value.span: 隔线宽度（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: The column rule width, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认值为 0.0。

span.span: The default is 0.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列规则是内容的列之间绘制和用于直观地分隔开的列的行。The column rule is a line that is drawn between columns, and is used to visually separate columns of content. 此属性如果不起作用属性是`null`。This property has no effect if the property is `null`. 有两个或多个列时，仅显示列规则。Column rules are only displayed when there are two or more columns. 隔线宽度约束为不可小于或等于。The column rule width is constrained to be less than or equal to the . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double ColumnWidth { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 中列的所需最小宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum desired width of the columns in a .

value.span: 所需的最小列宽，以与设备无关的像素为单位。

span.span: The minimum desired column width, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 值为 会导致无论页面宽度如何，都只显示一列。

span.span: A value of causes only one column to be displayed, regardless of the page width.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A动态调整其内容以最大化内容演示文稿中可用的显示空间。A dynamically adjusts its contents to maximize content presentation within the available display space. 可以放入可用的显示空间，提供此属性指定的最小列宽的列数由确定可见列的数目。The number of visible columns is determined by the number of columns that can fit in available display space, given the minimum column width specified by this property. 实际的列宽度可能大于此属性指定的值。The actual column width may be greater than the value specified by this property. 在任一方向窗口的大小发生更改所做的工作会动态地重新进行充分利用的空间列。Changing the size of the window in either direction will result in columns being dynamically regenerated to make the best use of space. 这种方式，内容可以动态地适应用户的环境。In this way, the content dynamically adapts to the user's environment. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::FlowDirection FlowDirection { System::Windows::FlowDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::FlowDirection value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 中内容流的相对方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the relative direction for flow of content in a .

value.span: 值之一，指定相对流动方向。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the relative flow direction.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将返回当前有效的流动方向。Getting this property returns the currently effective flow direction. 设置此属性将导致的内容重新排列在指示的方向。Setting this property causes the contents of the to reflow in the indicated direction. 的内容通常对应于所表示语言的固有流动方向。The of content typically corresponds to the innate flow direction of the language being represented. 希伯来语和阿拉伯语是从右到左流动的语言的示例。Hebrew and Arabic are examples of languages that naturally flow from right to left. 英语、 德语和俄语是自然流从左到右的语言的示例。English, German, and Russian are examples of languages that naturally flow from left to right. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值不会自动更改以匹配由操作系统使用的语言。The value of this property is not automatically changed to match the language used by the operating system. 如果你需要使用不同的值，则默认的，您必须亲自指定。If you need to use a different value then the default of , you must specify it yourself. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirectionXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentflowdirectionxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentflowdirection)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentFlowDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentflowdirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ FontFamily { System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的首选顶级字体系列。

span.span: Gets or sets the preferred top-level font family for the .

value.span: 一个 对象，指定首选字体系列，或者指定一个主要首选字体系列并附带一个或多个备用字体系列。

span.span: A object specifying the preferred font family, or a primary preferred font family with one or more fallback font families.

value.span: 默认字体是由 值确定的字体。

span.span: The default is the font determined by the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何子元素上的设置将重写此顶层的设置。Any settings on child elements will override this top-level setting. 如果指定多个系列，第二个和后续的字体系列用作备用系列可以用于中的情况下，主字体系列不可用或不适用。When multiple families are specified, the second and subsequent font families serve as fallback families to be used in cases where the primary font family is unavailable or not applicable. 此属性指定的首选项。This property specifies a preference only. 如果指定的字体系列不可用，将以无提示方式回退到由确定的字体值。If the specified font family is not available, the will silently fall back to the font determined by the value. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsColumnWidthFlexible { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 值是可变的还是固定的。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the value is flexible or fixed.

value.span: 如果列宽是可变的，则为 ；如果列宽是固定的，则为 。

span.span: if the column width is flexible; if the column width is fixed.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定在其中任何多余的内容区域宽度 （即，对页宽和内容布后的宽度之间的差异） 分布列的方式。The property determines the manner in which any excess content area width (that is, the difference between the page width and the width of the content after it is laid out) is distributed among columns. 设置为`true`意味着分发额外的空间同样每一列; 在这种情况下，列可能会比指定的宽度更宽大小属性。A setting of `true` means that the extra space is distributed equally to each column; in this case, columns may be sized wider than the width specified by the property. 设置为`false`意味着多余空间分配给页面右侧的边距; 在这种情况下，列始终将调整为指定的宽度属性 (只要该宽度小于减去所有页面宽度 < c4 1> )。A setting of `false` means excess space is distributed to the padding on the right side of the page; in this case, columns will always size to the width specified by the property (so long as that width is smaller than the width of the page minus any ). 下图说明了在布局中的差异，当此属性为`true`或`false`。The following figure illustrates the difference in layout when this property is `true` or `false`. 浅蓝色表示列中的内容。Light blue represents columns of content in a . ![屏幕快照： 比较 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "屏幕快照： 比较 IsColumnWidthFlexible 值")![Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values](~/add/media/flowdoc-columnflex.png "Screenshot: Compare IsColumnWidthFlexible values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlexXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentcolumnflexxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumentcolumnflex)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentColumnFlex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumentcolumnflex)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsColumnWidthFlexibleProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsHyphenationEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用文字的自动断字功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic hyphenation of words is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果启用自动对文字进行断字和添加连字符，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if automatic breaking and hyphenation of words is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动断字功能使以自动中断并添加连字符的单词，根据当前布局情况。The automatic word hyphenation feature enables a to automatically break and hyphenate words, based on current layout conditions. 这使得较长的单词要开始在同一行并继续到下，从而更均匀地分布的两端对齐文本中的空白区域。This enables long words to begin on one line and continue on this next, and tends to achieve a more even distribution of white space in justified text. 单词是损坏的根据标准的语法规则添加连字符。Words are broken and hyphenated according to standard grammar rules. 自动断字是特别高效结合了最佳段落布局 (由表示属性)。Automatic hyphenation is particularly effective when coupled with optimal paragraph layout (represented by the property). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenthyphenatexaml)] 下图显示如何前面呈现。The following figure shows how the preceding renders. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument 连字符启用](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "屏幕快照： 启用连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下图显示如何相同呈现了默认设置的 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![屏幕快照： 使用禁用的连字符 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "屏幕快照： 具有禁用的连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenthyphenate)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenthyphenate)]

Public Shared ReadOnly IsHyphenationEnabledProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsOptimalParagraphEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用最佳段落布局功能。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether optimal paragraph layout is enabled or disabled.

value.span: 如果启用最佳段落布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if optimal paragraph layout is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最佳段落布局是一种布局中的段落以便尽可能均匀地分布的空白区域。Optimal paragraph layout is a feature that lays out paragraphs in the such that white space is distributed as evenly as possible. 从理论上讲，这将通过消除让人分散注意力的空白区域的行对齐文本和其他布局例程会提供最佳的阅读体验。Theoretically, this provides an optimized reading experience by eliminating distracting white space that can occur with line-justified text and other layout routines. 最佳段落布局是特别高效结合了自动断字功能 (由表示属性)。Optimal paragraph layout is particularly effective when coupled with automatic hyphenation (represented by the property). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置属性元素。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenateXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenthyphenatexaml)] 下图显示如何前面呈现。The following figure shows how the preceding renders. ![屏幕快照： FlowDocument 连字符启用](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "屏幕快照： 启用连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphenenabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument hyphen enabled") 下图显示如何相同呈现了默认设置的 = `false`。The following figure shows how the same renders with the default setting of =`false`. ![屏幕快照： 使用禁用的连字符 FlowDocument](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "屏幕快照： 具有禁用的连字符的 FlowDocument")![Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens](~/add/media/flowdoc-hyphendisabled.png "Screenshot: FlowDocument with disabled hyphens") 下面的示例演示如何设置属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenthyphenate)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentHyphenate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenthyphenate)]

summary.span: 获取或设置各行内容的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of each line of content.

value.span: 各行高度均介于 0.0034 到 160000 之间（以与设备无关的像素为单位）。

span.span: The height of each line, in device independent pixels, in the range 0.0034 to 160000.

value.span: 值为(等效于特性值的"自动") 使行高度由当前字体特征自动确定。

span.span: A value of (equivalent to an attribute value of "Auto") causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改此值不会更改关联的文本; 的高度相反，它将更改包含文本行的高度。Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; rather, it changes the height of the line that contains the text. 若要更改的文本大小，使用属性。To change the size of the text, use the property. 除了此属性中的行的布局受其属性。In addition to this property, the layout of lines in a is affected by its property. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: is set to a non-positive value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果上，查看属性优先于属性，后者又优先于属性。If viewed on a continuum, the property takes precedence over the property, which in turn takes precedence over the property. 如果给定页上设置所有三个属性，这是中的计算属性的顺序。If all three properties are set on a given page, this is the order in which the properties are evaluated. 此属性未包含任何时生效设置为（自动）。This property has no effect when is set to (auto). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Thickness PagePadding { System::Windows::Thickness get(); void set(System::Windows::Thickness value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示页面边界和页面内容之间填充空间的厚度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the thickness of padding space between the boundaries of a page and the page's content.

value.span: A结构，它以设备独立像素为单位指定要应用的填充量。

span.span: A structure that specifies the amount of padding to apply, in device independent pixels.

value.span: 默认为统一粗细，即零 (0.0)。

span.span: The default is a uniform thickness of zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被描述为所有方向的一致性 (`PagePadding="10"`)，或如四个不同值表示保留，排名靠前的、 右键，并底部独立填充 (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`)。 can be described as uniform in all directions (`PagePadding="10"`), or as four distinct values that represent left, top, right, and bottom padding independently (`PagePadding="5,0,10,20"`). 如果指定的填充厚度超过相应的页面尺寸 （例如的左边和右边距宽度的总和超过页宽度），将按比例降低的填充厚度不晚于相关的页面尺寸.If a specified padding thickness exceeds the corresponding page dimension (for example, the sum of the left and right padding widths exceeds the page width), the thickness of the padding will be proportionally reduced to be no greater than the relevant page dimension. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果上，查看属性优先于属性，后者又优先于属性。If viewed on a continuum, the property takes precedence over the property, which in turn takes precedence over the property. 如果给定页上设置所有三个属性，这是中的计算属性的顺序。If all three properties are set on a given page, this is the order in which the properties are evaluated. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是仅适用于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字体。The property is applicable only to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] fonts. 版式变体不起上不支持该变体的字体。A typography variant has no effect on fonts that do not support the variant. 本主题的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 中的版式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md)。For more information on this topic, see [Typography in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/typography-in-wpf.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置与各种版式变体属性元素。The following example shows how to set various typography variations with the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypographyXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumenttypographyxaml)] 下面的示例演示如何设置的各个方面属性以编程方式。The following example shows how to set various aspects of the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypography](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_flowdocumenttypography)] [!code-vb[FlowDocumentSnippets#_FlowDocumentTypography](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FlowDocumentSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_flowdocumenttypography)]
